entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
